headline: Intercontinental Exchange Taps Reddit AI Signals To Deepen Data Offerings
summary: Intercontinental Exchange (NYSE:ICE) has launched Reddit Signals and Sentiment, a data analytics service built on Reddit conversations. The product uses AI to scan millions of Reddit posts and comments in real time and translate them into sentiment and trading signals for institutional investors. The launch is aimed at investors looking to integrate social media conversation into research and trading workflows. Intercontinental Exchange, best known for its exchanges and data services, is...
